contest-event.event-date:
Oct. 20, 1934 D South Wales & Monmouthshire Brass Band Association (B Section)
South Wales & Monmouthshire Brass Band Association (B Section) 20 Test Piece Contest South Wales & Monmouthshire Brass Band Association south-wales-monmouthshire-brass-band-association-b
Workmens' Hall, Abercynon, Mid Glamorgan, Wales, UK Prizes - 1st £10 and shield, 2nd £6, 3rd £4, 4th £2. March contest - 1st Blaina, 2nd Brynmawr. Deportment - Hirwaun. 6 bands competed.
Oct. 24, 2013, 11:15 a.m. Jan. 7, 2019, 11:06 p.m.
1 Brynmawr R.V D. J. Stevens
2 Hirwaun Welfare Town D. J. Edwards
3 Blaina & District J. Probert
Unknown Result Tredegar Town Band Unknown
